metadata.title: CVE-2015-7695 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The PDO adapters in Zend Framework before 1.12.16 do not filer null bytesin SQL statements, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via a crafted query.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
